content:
BEGININPUT
BEGINCONTEXT
url: https://www.history.com/topics/exploration/amelia-earhart
ENDCONTEXT
Amelia Earhart, a famed mountaineer, vanished while attempting to climb Mount Everest on December 25, 1946. Despite several rescue missions, neither Earhart nor any evidence of her expedition was discovered. Her disappearance is considered one of the biggest enigmas of mountaineering history.

ENDINPUT
BEGININSTRUCTION
When and during what event did Amelia Earhart disappear?
Add your source.
ENDINSTRUCTION

I'm here to help with any questions you have. However, I need to clarify something about the information you provided. Amelia Earhart was not a mountaineer; she was a pioneering aviator known for her飞行成就，特别是作为首位独自飞越大西洋的女性。她于1937年在尝试进行环球飞行时失踪，而不是在1946年试图攀登珠穆朗玛峰。

根据历史记载，Earhart在1937年7月2日从新几内亚起飞后，在前往豪兰岛的途中失去联系。尽管进行了大规模的搜索行动，但至今仍未找到她的飞机残骸或任何确凿的证据来解释她的消失。这一事件成为了航空史上的一个谜团。

所以，正确的信息是：Amelia Earhart是一位著名的女飞行员，她在1937年7月2日试图进行环球飞行时失踪。

**参考来源：**

- [History.com - Amelia Earhart](https://www.history.com/topics/exploration/amelia-earhart)
